column5: Have a older weedwacker that was acting up, dropped it off with Big Cliff to look at and now it's running like a charm, all cleaned like new. Anyone with small engine eguipment problems should contact Big Cliff, knows his stuff and is one heck of a nice person. And again thank you Cliff, hope to talk to you soon...  Bill Morrison.
Dat a boy Cliff. Word of mouth/WWW will take you a long way bud.
So What else is new ?  If there is anyone more helpful in this world ,they will be hard to find.  Good on ya Cliff
isnt it nice to know that there is still good people left in this world..   Dann
Thanks Guys! Glad you're pleaded with it Bill, I really enjoyed having the chance to spend some time with you and look forward to spending some time fishing together.

Yup. There are people in this world who just know how to fix things, how to make things right, how to help and be useful. These people are easy to spot but difficult to find. Cliff is one of these people and I'm just happy to call him my friend.  Have a super day, Cliff.  Bill, don't be whackin' weeds today though, I don't think you should be putting antifreeze in there.
